div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), May 3, 1912. NORWEGIAN IN THE SCHOOLS

body.p: At the meeting of the School Board last Wednesday, it was decided to teach Norwegian and Swedish in the public high schools. Classes will be opened this fall. The Norwegian member of the board, Charles O. Sethness, has worked hard to get the Board to approve this action, and it is through his efforts that Norwegian and Swedish children will learn to read and write the language of their fathers.....
